items.title: How DoorDash can help you save money – and earn points – on everyday purchases with discounted gift cards
items.description: DoorDash delivers more than groceries and meals. This popular delivery service also allows you to save money on gift cards.

items.title: Deal alert: Earn 15% cash back at Dell on Wednesday only with Rakuten
items.description: Rakuten is offering 10% back during its Big Stack Event, plus a special deal every Wednesday this summer.

items.title: A 'green flag' for travel? Deal-seekers see hope amid uneven demand for flights
items.description: Delta Air Lines had a good second quarter. But is it a true "good sign" for the rest of the travel industry? Time will tell.

items.title: Deal of the day: Fly business class to Dublin for just 45K miles during peak season
items.description: Fly to Dublin in comfort this summer and fall from several major U.S. cities starting at just 45,000 miles. Here's what to know and how to book.

items.title: Manhattan just got its first-ever Hyatt Regency
items.description: Manhattan just got its first-ever Hyatt Regency, located right in Times Square. Here's what we know.
